abstract: DJ Shadow, a pioneer of hip-hop soundscapes, drops a new album on Tuesday called "The Less You Know the Better."
snippet: DJ Shadow, a pioneer of hip-hop soundscapes, drops a new album on Tuesday called "The Less You Know the Better."
lead_paragraph: DJ Shadow has lived for 15 years in the shadow of his own success. The San Francisco disc jockey has put out just three full-length albums since the critically acclaimed "Endtroducing" in 1996, which helped define the then cutting-edge genre of instrumental hip-hop: dance music with symphonic sweep built from scores of samples dug out of eclectic and often obscure recordings.

headline.main: DJ Shadow Talks About His Latest Sonic Collages
